segments.text: I'm observing the woman at the sink, truly fixated on her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's so focused on drying that plate, almost to an extreme degree.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her hands move with a practiced, rhythmic motion.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the water pooling around her feet, growing wider by the second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not feel that cold water seeping into her shoe?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's honestly quite frustrating to watch her complete lack of awareness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is wide open, a constant stream pouring into the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's astonishing how deeply engrossed she is in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She wears a dress and a neat apron, looking perfectly composed otherwise.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn't she hear the continuous flow of the overflowing water?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me wonder what thoughts occupy her mind so completely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression is utterly neutral, devoid of any hint of trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shout and warn her about the impending disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This level of oblivious concentration is almost a superpower.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a strange kind of peace she possesses, given the circumstances.
segments.speaker: PAR
